get a gamer >>> gt = xbox.GamerProfile.from_gamertag('JoeAlcorn') >>> gt.gamerscore 22056 >>> gt.gamerpic 'http://images-eds.xboxlive.com/image?url=z951ykn43p4FqWbbFvR2Ec.8vbDhj8G2Xe7JngaTToBrrCmIEEXHC9UNrdJ6P7KIFXxmxGDtE9Vkd62rOpb7JcGvME9LzjeruYo3cC50qVYelz5LjucMJtB5xOqvr7WR' >>> #
